com.panayotis.gnuplot.plot

Class DataSetPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
        • com.panayotis.gnuplot.PropertiesHolder
          • com.panayotis.gnuplot.plot.AbstractPlot
            • com.panayotis.gnuplot.plot.DataSetPlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plot, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>

    public class DataSetPlot
extends AbstractPlot
    This plot uses data sets as coordinates of the points to e displayed. The user can provide data either statically (through the specialized constructors with native base types) or with the more flexible generic object PointDataSet.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveData

        public void retrieveData(java.lang.StringBuilder bf)
        Retrieve the data set of this plot command. It is used internally by JavaPlot library. Please do not use it.
        Parameters:
        bf - The buffer to store the data set

      • setDataSet
